author: warmandwild
title: Comfortable and central to everything
text:
Comfortable and clean modern hotel right in the center of les Halles area just steps away from le Metro and numerous shops and bistros. The room was simple and well designed. Kitchenette was well equipped with a dishwasher no less. Extra towels, linens etc available at the self serve room. 24 hour coffee/tea/filtered water available in lobby. Staff very helpful and pleasant. I recommend this hotel.
Room Tip: If you are looking for a quiet room ask for one in the inner courtyard. See more room tips
